title: objective civil control
description: Anyone who renounces responsibility also renounces the decision.
description_hu: Aki lemond a felelősségről, az lemond a döntésről is.
description_full: Politics, just like big corporations, have their own perspective. Politics, just like big corporations, must be well regulated, to keep them from breaking fundamental rules of humanity, generosity, responsibility, laying outside of their views. This webring is a curated list of civil movements on the goals alike.
